org.jdrupes.httpcodec

Class ClientEngine<Q extends MessageHeader,R extends MessageHeader>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jdrupes.httpcodec.Engine<R,Q>
      • org.jdrupes.httpcodec.ClientEngine<Q,R>
  • Type Parameters:
    Q - the message header type handled be the encoder (the request)
    R - the message header type handled by the decoder (the response)

    public abstract class ClientEngine<Q extends MessageHeader,R extends MessageHeader>
extends Engine<R,Q>
    An engine that can be used as a client. It has an associated request encoder and a response decoder.
    Author:
    Michael N. Lipp

        public Decoder.Result decode(java.nio.ByteBuffer in,

                             boolean endOfInput)

        the result
        Throws:
        ProtocolException - if the input violates the protocol
